content.1: Then Solomon began to build the house of the
content.2: And he began to build in the second
content.5: And the greater house he cieled with fir tree, which he overlaid with fine gold, and set thereon palm trees and chains.
content.6: And he garnished the house with precious stones for beauty: and the gold
content.7: He overlaid also the house, the beams, the posts, and the walls thereof, and the doors thereof, with gold; and graved cherubims on the walls.
content.8: And he made the most holy house, the length whereof
content.9: And the weight of the nails
content.10: And in the most holy house he made two cherubims of image work, and overlaid them with gold.
content.11: And the wings of the cherubims
content.13: The wings of these cherubims spread themselves forth twenty cubits: and they stood on their feet, and their faces
content.15: Also he made before the house two pillars of thirty and five cubits high, and the chapiter that
content.17: And he reared up the pillars before the temple, one on the right hand, and the other on the left; and called the name of that on the right hand Jachin, and the name of that on the left Boaz.
